name: TCVP Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .tcvp extension has been maliciously renamed and encrypted by TCVP ransomware . It contains a document, video, image, or other type of file the ransomware is holding hostage. The .tcvp extension is added to the file's normal extension, producing a compound extension like .docx.tcvp .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
